Properties.Title: Malicious Software Detected
Properties.Summary: The malicious software removal tool found instances of malicious software

Content.DirectTextContent: The Microsoft Malicious Software Removal Tool reports that this computer is infected with malicious software.

Properties.Title: Security Center Libraries Missing or Not Valid
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that it cannot find or access this computer's security center libraries.

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that it cannot find or access your computer's Security Center libraries

Properties.Title: Operating System Not Supported
Properties.Summary: The engine is not designed for the computer's operating system

Properties.Title: Disk Space Low
Properties.Summary: There is less than 5% or 5 GB of space remaining on this computer's system drive

Content.DirectTextContent: This computer's system drive is running low on disk space.
Please free up some disk space before continuing.

Properties.Title: Utility Cancelled
Properties.Summary: The user cancelled the utility before it could complete

Content.DirectTextContent: You have opted to cancel !ApplicationTitle! before it could complete its configuration tasks.

Properties.Title: Could Not Verify Utility Signature
Properties.Summary: The signature for this version of the utility is missing or invalid

Content.DirectTextContent: This version of !ApplicationTitle! is not signed or has an invalid signature.

Properties.Title: Newer Version Available
Properties.Summary: A newer version of the utility is available

Content.DirectTextContent: A newer version of !ApplicationTitle! is available.
Please update !ApplicationTitle! before continuing.

Properties.Title: No Networking Hardware Present
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that this computer does not have a valid network interface

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that this computer does not have a valid network interface.
Please ensure that your networking hardware is enabled.

Properties.Title: No Networking Hardware Present
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that this computer is not currently connected to the network

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that this computer is not currently connected to the network.
Please verify that your computer is connected to the network before running !ApplicationTitle!.

Properties.Title: Network Address Translation
Properties.Summary: This computer is behind a NAT device

Content.DirectTextContent: This computer is connected to a personal router or some other network address translation device.
Network address translation is not allowed on the campus network. Please connect your computer directly to the campus network and run !ApplicationTitle! again.

Properties.Title: Network Bridging Detected
Properties.Summary: One of this computer's network adapters is configured to do network bridging

Content.DirectTextContent: One or more of this computer's network adapter has network bridging enabled.
Network bridging is not allowed on the campus network. Please disable network bridging and run !ApplicationTitle! again.

Properties.Title: Banner Not Found
Properties.Summary: A named banner was not found in the utility's list of available banners

Content.DirectTextContent: The utility could not locate one of its banners

Properties.Title: System Restore Disabled
Properties.Summary: The system restore service is disabled

Content.DirectTextContent: This computer's System Restore service is disabled.

Properties.Title: Computer's System Time Not Correct
Properties.Summary: The computer's system time is wrong

Content.DirectTextContent: If your computer's system time is wrong, you may experience issues accessing certificate-protected network resources or websites.
Please correct your computer's clock before continuing.

Properties.Title: Handled Exception Occurred
Properties.Summary: The utility encountered a critical, but handled exception

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! has encountered a critical issue and cannot continue.

Properties.Title: Branch Not Found
Properties.Summary: There was an issue loading or initialzing a task branch

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to load or initialize a task branch.

Properties.Title: Could Not Retrieve Content
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not retrieve content from its server

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to retrieve content from the !ApplicationTitle! server.

Properties.Title: Could Not Record Log Entry
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not record a log entry

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to record a log entry.

Properties.Title: Could Not Record Create Restore Point
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not create a system restore point

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to create a system restore point.

Properties.Title: Could Not Configure Screen-Saver
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not configure the Windows screen-saver

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to configure your screen-saver.

Properties.Title: Dialog Manager Not Present
Properties.Summary: The specified dialog manager is missing or not instantiated

Content.TempObjectFieldContent: A dialog instance ({Dialog}) is missing or not instantiated.

Properties.Title: Could Not Retrieve File Information
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not retrieve file information from its server

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to retrieve file information from the !ApplicationTitle! server.

Properties.Title: Could Not Retrieve Status Information
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not retrieve status information from its server

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to retrieve status information from the !ApplicationTitle! server.

Properties.Title: Could Not Register Computer
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not register this computer for network access

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to register this computer for network access.

Properties.Title: File Not Found
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not find or access a required file

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not find or access a required file.

Properties.Title: Directory Not Found
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not find or access a required directory

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not find or access a required directory.

Properties.Title: Could Not Retrieve User Certificate
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not retrieve a valid certificate for this user

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to retrieve a user certificate.

Properties.Title: Could Not Install User Certificate
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not install a certificate for this user

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to install a user certificate.

Properties.Title: Could Not Verify User Credentials
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not verify this user's credentials

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to verify your network credentials.

Properties.Title: Could Not Download Content
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not download required content.

Content.TempObjectFieldContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not download the content file, {Target}.

Properties.Title: Could Not Add Wireless Profile
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not add a wireless profile

Content.DirectTextContent: An issue occurred while attempting to add a wireless profile.

Properties.Title: Service Configuration Issue
Properties.Summary: !ApplicationTitle! could not modify or configure a windows service

Content.TempObjectFieldContent: An issue occurred while attempting to configure the {Name} service.

Properties.Title: Unable to Determine Server Address
Properties.Summary: The utility could not determine its default server address

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not determine its default server address.

Properties.Title: Unable to Import Content
Properties.Summary: The utility could not import one of its content files

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not import a required content resource.

Properties.Title: No Administrator Password Set
Properties.Summary: The local account running the utility has not administrator password set

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that you have no administrator password set.

Properties.Title: Security Center Not Active
Properties.Summary: The Windows Security Center is not active

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that its Security Center is not active.

Properties.Title: Anti-Virus Health is Poor
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that this computer's anti-virus software is in poor health.

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that this computer's anti-virus software is in poor health.
This may mean that this computer's anti-virus software is out-of-date and/or inactive.

Properties.Title: Anti-Virus Health is Not Monitored
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that it is not monitoring the status of this computer's anti-virus health.

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that it is not monitoring the status of this computer's anti-virus health.

Properties.Title: Anti-Spyware Health is Poor
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that this computer's anti-sSpyware software is in poor health.

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that this computer's anti-spyware software is in poor health.
This may mean that this computer's anti-Spyware software is out-of-date and/or inactive.

Properties.Title: Anti-Spyware Health is Not Monitored
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that it is not monitoring the status of this computer's anti-spyware health.

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that it is not monitoring the status of this computer's anti-spyware health.

Properties.Title: Could Not Apply Security Policy
Properties.Summary: The utility could not supply a security policy

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not apply its Windows security policies.

Properties.Title: Restart Pending
Properties.Summary: A windows restart is pending

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows indicates that a system restart is pending.
Please restart your computer before running !ApplicationTitle!.

Properties.Title: Software Installation Failed
Properties.Summary: A software package failed to install

Properties.Title: BitLocker Encryption Not Preset
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that one or more drives on this computer are not secured with BitLocker Drive Encryption

Content.DirectTextContent: Windows reports that your computer's drives are not secured with BitLocker Drive Encryption.

Properties.Title: BitLocker Encryption Status Not Available
Properties.Summary: The utility could not determine the BitLocker encryption status for one or more of this computer's drives

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not determine whether or not one or more of this computer's drives are secured with BitLocker Drive Encryption.

Properties.Title: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 Required
Properties.Summary: The utility requires Windows 7 Service Pack 1

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! requires Windows 7 Service Pack 1. Please install this service pack before continuing.

Properties.Title: Windows Vista Service Pack 2 Required
Properties.Summary: The utility requires Windows Vista Service Pack 2

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! requires Windows Vista Service Pack 2. Please install this service pack before continuing.

Properties.Title: Update Failed
Properties.Summary: The utility could not install one of more Windows updates

Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not install one or more Windows updates.

Properties.Title: Critical Updates Not Installed
Properties.Summary: Windows reports that one or more critical updates are not installed on this computer

Properties.Title: Service Configuration Missing
Properties.Summary: The registry configuration section for a service is missing on this computer

Content.TempObjectFieldContent: Your computer is missing a registry configuration key for the {ServiceName} service.
Content.DirectTextContent: !ApplicationTitle! requires that this key be present so that it can modify this service.

Properties.Title: Service Instance Unavailable
Properties.Summary: the utility could not find or instantiate and instance of a windows service

Content.TempObjectFieldContent: !ApplicationTitle! could not locate or instatiate an instance of the {ServiceName} service.
